casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sammy C. PERKINS. No. 60A94-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 23, 2004. Edwin L. West, III, Wilmington, for Perkins. Steven M. Arbogast, Special Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of September 2004 by Defendant to Vacate Disproportionate and Excessive Death Sentence:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of September 2004."
